sec.p: The hierarchical integration of climate suitability predicted from regional climate models (calibrated at Iberian level) with the environmental suitability predicted from local ENMs (calibrated at Gerês-Xurés level, based upon land use/cover and ecosystem functioning variables) significantly improved our predictions within (AUC mean up to 0.97; Fig. 3; ΣW APP = 0.90; Table 3), but not beyond the model calibration time period (Fig. 3; ΣW APP = 0.26; see ‘Internal TT’ in Table 3; ΣW APP = 0.28; see ‘External TT’ in Table 3).
